A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This might be my favorite Star Wars movie\, and yes\, that includes Empire. There are a few flaws (something about the pacing of the Poe/Rose plotline didn't seem great\, and Phasma was even more disappointing than Boba Fett)\, but on the whole it's a beautiful film. Adam Driver and Daisy Ridley have an amazing chemistry that I can't wait to see again in Episode IX. I had my share of fan theories\, but the big ones didn't pan out. And I think that's a GOOD thing! A big part of this movie is leaving the past behind\, which is a bitter pill to swallow for some fans (as you can see from the 53% user rating as of this writing). I love the old Star Wars films\, and this is a wonderful\, bittersweet farewell to the original trilogy. Thank you\, Rian Johnson! Now I just need to go see it a third time...
